text: Rhys Walker (born 26 January 1994) is a badminton player from England. He started paying badminton at age 8, then in 2013, he won bronze medal at the European Junior Badminton Championships in men's singles event. == Achievements == === European Junior Championships === Boys' singles {| class="sortable wikitable" style="font-size: 90%;" !
